text: Victoria's Secret is an American company. It is the largest American seller of lingerie. It was founded in 1977 in San Francisco by Roy Raymond. Its headquarters are in Columbus, Ohio. The sales in 2012 were $6.12 billion. The company sells lingerie, women's clothing, and beauty products through catalogs and physical stores. == Marketing == ===Victoria's Secret Angels=== Angels is one of Victoria's Secret's lingerie lines. It was started in 1997 with a commercial featuring Helena Christensen, Karen Mulder, Daniela Peštová, Stephanie Seymour, and Tyra Banks as well as rock star Tom Jones. The commercial was a major success. The Angels began to be featured in various commercials, alongside other contract models. In February 1998, the Angels made their runway debut at Victoria's Secret's 4th annual fashion show. Chandra North filled in for Christensen. Retrieved 2013-11-25. 2008 2009–present United States Lindsay Ellingson 2011–2014 2006 2007–present United States Karlie Kloss 2013–2015 2011 2011–present Russia Kate Grigorieva 2015-present 2014 2014-present 10 Angels were added at the same time United States Taylor Marie Hill 2015-present 2014 2014-present Sweden Elsa Hosk 2015-present 2011 2011-present United States Martha Hunt 2015-present 2012 2013-present Poland Jac Jagaciak 2015-present 2013 2013-present Ireland Stella Maxwell 2015-present 2014 2014-present Brazilian Lais Ribeiro 2015-present 2010 2010-2011 ; 2013-present Portugal Sara Sampaio 2015-present 2013 2013-present Netherlands Romee Strijd 2015-present 2014 2014-present United States Jasmine Tookes 2015-present 2012 2012-present == Fantasy Bra == Typically, one model is chosen among the Angels to wear a bejeweled bra called the "Fantasy Bra". It was first advertised in the Victoria's Secret catalog. But since 2001 it has been worn in the Fashion Shows. Prior to each Fashion Show, Victoria's Secret contracts a famous jewelry designer to create the bra to promote the fashion show. The company offers the Fantasy Bra for sale as "the ultimate holiday" gift. But only the fantasy bras from the 2004 Heavenly "70" Fantasy Bra and the 2012 Floral Fantasy Bra and Gift Set have found buyers. If not bought, the bras are taken apart after a year. Heidi Klum and Adriana Lima have worn the Fantasy Bra in three different years. Gisele Bündchen, Tyra Banks, Karolína Kurková, and Alessandra Ambrosio have each worn two Fantasy Bras. The $15 million price tag for the 2000 bra worn by Gisele Bündchen earned a place in the Guinness World Records as the most expensive item of lingerie ever created. The $3 million 2009 Harlequin Fantasy Bra and the $2 million 2010 Bombshell Fantasy Bra were designed by Damiani. Listed below are the prices per set (including accessories for the 2007 and 2013 editions, the 2013 bra alone is worth $8,000,000). The 2012 Floral Fantasy Bra was accompanied by a $500,000 perfume bottle. In 2014, for the first time, two fantasy bras were created. They were worn by Alessandra Ambrosio and Adriana Lima and were valued at $2,000,000 each. == Notes == == References == == Other websites == * Victoria's Secret - Official Site * Victoria's Secret the Business of Fashion Category:1977 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in California Category:American clothing companies Category:Columbus, Ohio Category:Companies based in San Francisco
